channel.title: sillygwailo tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from sillygwailo.

item.description: Tonight. https://t.co/TTmciD8QYt

@davewiner In my excitement about this idea, I fixed a bug in the software I use that dynamically generates OPML of RSS feeds (don‚Äôt worry, I‚Äôm bragging, not complaining). I‚Äôm looking forward to helping where I can.
@dailysimpsons The sounds Skinner makes before opening the door gets me every time.

@davewiner I want to be a part of this from the producing side. https://t.co/uxnHHSj6o7 is an OPML file that RSS readers which support reading lists can subscribe to. I‚Äôll update it with feeds of where I‚Äôm blogging as time goes on.
It‚Äôs barely noon, and I‚Äôve already run the dishwasher twice, if you know what I mean.
VAR is killing basketball.

@Fahrni That‚Äôs not what @davewiner is requesting. He‚Äôs suggesting that RSS readers support periodically visiting an OPML file, hosted on the Internet, that's maintained by someone, and when it‚Äôs updated, so is the subscription list in the consuming RSS reader.
@chron Major League Baseball should strip the Yankees of the the World Series championships they won in 2015 and 2016.

@spectator Rules of thumb: ‚Ä¢ I guarantee you they noticed that you‚Äôre staring. You just didn‚Äôt notice that they noticed. ‚Ä¢ You‚Äôre allowed to look, but take a mental picture if you want to remember it, then look at something else. ‚Ä¢ If you can tell they noticed you staring, then stop.

I gave a speech at our team meeting about dealing with things that have piled up, and mmmmmaybe it‚Äôs a ‚Äúphysician, heal thyself‚Äù situation.
At least I had the presence of mind to say ‚Äúand when I say this, I‚Äôm talking to myself‚Äù a lot.

Tonight. https://t.co/u8i0S4JSnA
1-2-3 4th inning defensively for the Blue Jays. Shots are on me!
My view from the cheap seats. https://t.co/K8DbV9vFIp
Tyler Danish is another white baseball player whose name sounds delicious. I‚Äôm adding him to the list.
Red Sox win. https://t.co/kJZtvdVhtH
If the @wnbatoronto team isn‚Äôt called the Cicadas, then Toronto Metropolitan University should use it for their varsity squads. https://t.co/JO61E9DAkD
@seanorr HYFR!

@justagwailo Infuriating that this video is way better than the official documentation on how to do this. There‚Äôs no indication of an essential step in Sony‚Äôs guide. This doesn‚Äôt feel like a ‚Äúbetter than nothing‚Äù situation.

Tonight. https://t.co/bxpxHhh3qY
You‚Äôll never guess what Gosuke Katoh‚Äôs walk-up music is. When you find out, you‚Äôre honour-bound to play the whole song.
VAR is killing baseball.
My view from the cheap seats. https://t.co/YxIfDLUgoW
Shrimp alert in Toronto! @shrimpalert
May 28th? But I‚Äôm ready for it now! https://t.co/2KitKJ6Sns
I really enjoyed my train ride across the Golden Gate Bridge when I was in San Francisco a few years back. It was a highlight of my trip. https://t.co/J4AMCS7Lnt
@AnakanaSchofiel Epitome. It‚Äôs one of those words that‚Äôs both fun to say and fun to spell out loud.

Tonight. https://t.co/x1h3Yd4YpB
My view from the cheap seats. https://t.co/MxB05VQY90
@cantpredictball Bradley Zimmer bunt single.
Rally-killing grand slam.
Lourdes Gurriel Jr. is a single and a triple away from the cycle, and those are the easiest hits to get.
VAR is killing baseball.
Blue Jays win! https://t.co/1y6a900mJI
@toddsieling I know someone who‚Äôs still been using that particular service this whole time, and that fact totally matches up with what I know about that person.
I‚Äôll see you over at Mastodon. https://t.co/A8ToqGOE0W

@nsylianteng Unordered list if they‚Äôre not instructions (with the most important point at the top), numbered list if it‚Äôs instructions. Sometimes, every now and then, a numbered list if I think the reader will use that as a reference for responding to my points, but that‚Äôs pretty rare.

If you‚Äôre going to quit Twitter, but still keep your account active, be sure to review your connected apps before you stop using it. If you don‚Äôt recognize the app or the app is defunct, revoke its access from your account. https://t.co/wbybXlLMV1
A reason to keep your Twitter account active even if you quit using it is that all of your tweets embedded on websites will disappear. https://t.co/3nlXSjR4pp
@rcousine I could also create a ‚ÄúRulers Twitter‚Äù list and make that my home timeline (some apps let you do that). ü§î
I wish I could split off to Rulers Twitter. https://t.co/aUl1r250QK
